DEMO_940_MSG_001:
̂I still can't belive it. A world where humans and monsters coexist.
ā
How did you guys persuade the Djinn anyway?
DEMO_940_MSG_002:
́About that....
ā
The Djinn heart was a little broken. So he was more willing to listen to me.
DEMO_940_MSG_004:
̂Mother going wild caused so many casualties. And I was so irritated and mad about that but....
ā
DEMO_940_MSG_005: ̂It changed the Djinn's heart.... at least some good things came out of that.
DEMO_940_MSG_007:
̂I was really worried when the Djinn returned but I'm so glad things turned out okay.
ā
DEMO_940_MSG_010:
̂Of course I am. You know how much I want to save our home planet.
ā
My team already left and is waiting for me. The pod is repaired too, so I should so.
DEMO_940_MSG_011:
̂But before I go, ȁ. I have a favor. Could we swap our reactors?
ā
DEMO_940_MSG_012:
̂It gets awfully lonely in outer space... and, well... I honestly
just wanted a small reminder of what we've done here.
ā
DEMO_940_MSG_013:
̂So, what do you say? Would you grant me this small
favor, and swap Reactors with me?Ă
DEMO_940_MSG_014:
̂Oh c'mon, ȁ... Really?
Can't you just cut me some slack, here?
DEMO_940_MSG_015:
̂Ah, wait! You're worried about losing all of the data
you've gathered, aren't you?
ā
DEMO_940_MSG_016:
̂I've already got that covered for you. I'm going to backup your
Reactors' data, right before we swap them!
ā
DEMO_940_MSG_017:
̂So, what do you say? Would you grant me this small
favor, and swap Reactors with me? Ă
DEMO_940_MSG_018:
̂Splendid! Alright, then. Let me make a backup of
your Reactors' data really quickly.
DEMO_940_MSG_019:
̂I'm... never going to forget everything we accomplished.
Hopefully, you'll never forget me either, will you?
DEMO_940_MSG_020: ̂Great! I'm going now. Thank you everything... I wish you all well!
DEMO_940_MSG_021: ̂When our home planet is restored, I will make sure that your tale gets told.
DEMO_940_MSG_022:
̂The one about how a legendary Monster Master, from another 
galaxy, sacrificed everything to save both of our planets.
